Description:
Style and Comfort!
Set in an ideal and sought-after location in Craigieburn, this modern well-presented home has a lot to offer first homebuyers, investors or those looking to downsize. With a functional and flexible floorplan you will be impressed with the open plan living which provides a sense of space and comfort. Features include a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals/living area, large master bedroom complete with ensuite, split system heating/cooling, stylish main bathroom, built in robes, a second living area or large study upstairs, double lock up garage with remote control entry and so much more. All this plus a low maintenance backyard area providing privacy and plenty of space to enjoy all year around. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. This home really does offer a blend of low maintenance living, without comprising on space or comfort and with all the amenities close by including Craigieburn Central, public transport & schools. Be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!
Insights: 6 Thirlestane Place, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 39 other 2 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Indoor Style & Outdoor Space on 650m2
With its stunning renovations, free-flowing design & fabulous entertaining spaces both inside & out, this single-level masterpiece delivers a family lifestyle of uncompromised quality & class - all on a large landscaped block.
A total transformation, the home's vogue interior showcases 3 great size bedrooms (master with walk in robe), luxurious ensuite & equally-opulent main bathroom fitted with Italian porcelain tiles - both with trendy black fittings & designer tiles. Add to this a superb stone-bench kitchen with high quality cabinetry, walk in butler's pantry, marble splashback, 900ml stainless steel appliances and all complementing the spacious & light-filled open living/dining area complete with Tassie Oak timber floorboards & fireplace.
Along with gas heating & evaporative cooling, separate study, formal living area & formal dining, wonderfully wide backyard is dominated by lush lawns & outdoor fire pit plus an oversized double garage with rear work shop, additionally there is plenty of space on site for boats, trailers, caravans & extra vehicles.
In a quiet yet wonderfully convenient location & close proximity to public transport, Craigieburn Central, Medical centre, Willmott primary school & Mount Ridley College.
Insights: 28 Studley Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary Living In Popular Highlands Estate
Located in the popular Highlands Estate, this immaculately presented home is just minutes to all amenities such as Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Hume Freeway, local library and aquatic centre, quality childcare facilities and schools, family friendly parks and recreational grounds.
Offering 3 bedrooms with BIRS (master with ensuite and WIR), multiple living areas, well-appointed kitchen adjoined to an open plan meals area leading onto a low maintenance backyard.
Additional features include central heating, additional lounge area and remote controlled garage with internal access.
The perfect opportunity for first home buyers, young families, astute investors or downsizers.
Corona Virus inspection policy will be in place to enact social distancing.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED

Description:
YOU'LL LOVE LIVING IN LAVINGTON
This home has all the space you're looking for! A great way to enter the property market and own this inviting family home with a fabulous floor plan, positioned in a tranquil court location, surrounded with an abundance of beautiful parklands with numerous walking and cycling paths with easy access to all of life's necessities, together with an abundance of quality educational facilities all within walking distance and further complimented by close proximity to shopping complexes, restaurants, recreation, sporting and business facilities.
3 bedroom home, master showcasing a fully renovated ensuite with large shower, black tapware and marble benchtop plus a walk-in robe.
The entrance opens to the combined formal lounge and dining with charming timber floors.
At the heart of the home, a well-designed kitchen with timber features, that caters perfectly overlooking the kiddies playing outside, fitted with stainless steel appliances including 900mm cooktop, wall oven plus additional integrated conventional/microwave oven, ample cupboard space, dishwasher and convenient breakfast bar/bench.
An adjoining meals area, overlooking the large living area.
Your comforts are well catered for with ducted heating, evaporative cooling, vacuum maid, modern blinds/drapes, video camera security, alarm system, solar panels and laundry with new cabinets/storage.
Double remote garage that has been optimised with the installation of a mezzanine floor, together with the advantage of an additional double entrance, leading to a large undercover entertainment area delivering a desirable built-in, gas mains BBQ, overlooking an enchanting cubby house with sandpit.
To the rear of the property is a convenient, large shed/workshop providing abundance of storage or for the "work at home" tradespeople with a coonara to keep warm and useful hot/cold water fixture alongside this.
Bus route 544 is short walk to Bridgewater Rd with additional bus routes on nearby Craigieburn Rd with 5 mins to train station.
Proudly sitting on a hefty 638m2 approx.. block of land.
24km north of Melbourne & 17km to Melb Airport with easy access to Craigieburn/Mickleham/Sydney Road as well as Craigieburn Bypass/Hume Freeway.

Description:
Light and Style with Urban Ease
Situated in a popular and convenient neighbourhood with easy access to the best of Craigieburn, this single-level home on approx. 472m2 delivers a lifestyle/investment opportunity with its generous floorplan, quality inclusions and excellent presentation throughout.
Light and bright interior features four bedrooms, neat master ensuite with WIR additional 3 bedrooms all with BIR serviced by the main bathroom and separate WC.
Add to this a formal lounge, theatre room and open lounge/dining area with well-appointed open-plan kitchen/meals, stone benchtops, stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other highlights include ducted heating and full laundry plus sunny alfresco entertaining area and genuinely large backyard and two car garage.
Impressive convenience, it's walking distance to shops, public transport and schools, also close to cafes, restaurants, buses, parkland, local sports facilities and major shopping centres as well. Inspection is a must!
Call us today!
Shikha Vaid 0414 689 144
Simran Khatrha 0431 178 435
*Photo ID Required At All Inspections*

Description:
Live in the Heart of Highlands Estate!!!
Universal Real Estate proudly present this beautiful house in the heart of Craigieburn in most sorted Highlands Estate. On a bigger block this 4 bedroom house will impress you and your family.
Specifications:
Bedroom: 4 massive bedrooms , Massive Master Bedroom with WIR and En-suite, other 3 spacious bedroom with BIR serviced by central bathroom with Bathtub
Kitchen : Spacious Modern Kitchen with Stainless steel appliances and electric oven , ample of cupboards for storage and Dishwasher.
Living : Open plan living / dining and massive formal lounge
Heating/ Cooling : Ducted Heating and split system cooling
Laundry : Large laundry with Backyard access
Backyard : Lush green grass in backyard with concrete side yard
Garage : Double car garage with drive through access and internal access.
location :
The house is very close to Highlands Shopping Centre , Highland Hotel , Parks and other local amenities. Close proximity to Mount Ridley College , Hume Anglican Grammar, Catholic Primary School and other major schools in Craigieburn. Easy access to Mount Ridley Road and Hume Freeway.
If you're in the market for that perfect all round property then look no further than this.
Don't miss out! Call Gordon Garg - 0433 897 397.

Brand New 4 Bedroom Family Home!
Quality family perfection, this stylish 4 bedroom home ticks all the boxes with its ready-to-enjoy lifestyle, situated in one of the finest locations in Craigieburn.
A master stroke with it's cleverly designed interior, which comprises of a stunning Master bedroom with walk in robe and luxurious ensuite, the remaining 3 bedrooms all have built in robes. Further complemented by its spacious and versatile open-plan living and family/dining area.
Features Include:
> Large open plan living & dining area
> Stunning kitchen with stone benchtops, ample bench space & pantry
> Quality 900mm stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher
> Spacious study area

> 2700 high ceilings
> Low maintenance landscaped front & rear yards
> Modern finishes throughout & much more!
Call today to secure this beautiful brand new property!
We also have a fantastic range of other homes on offer, call us to discuss.

Description:
Proudly Presented With Location To Match...
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all. Comprising of ducted heating & split system cooling, large open plan kitchen, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals area/living area, separate formal lounge, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, built in robes to all bedrooms, remote control double lock up garage with internal access plus much more. Step outside and the home is complete with low maintenance landscaped gardens and an alfresco area perfect for entertaining all year round. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Highlands Lake, Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Central, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
CONTEMPORARY ELEGANCE ON 512M2
Positioned in the highly desirable Aston Estate, this chic home is one of the hottest to hit the market. Offering sleek and spacious luxury low maintenance living it features a cleverly configured floor plan that effortlessly combines the contemporary comforts of sunlit open-plan living, whilst delivering a high level of style and functionality.
Boasting a welcoming island bench, the open plan kitchen finished in natural stone and complemented by an abundance of cupboard and bench space is the central heart of the home. Perfectly embracing the fireside family room this zone is framed by large windows and looks through sliding doors to an alfresco dining space, designed to encourage entertaining on the largest of scales.
An awesome cinema experience can be enjoyed from the sound proof theatre room, giving you the ultimate Gold class feeling. Designed to give you the best movie time experience it is equipped with sound system, projector and monitor.
The fashionable master bedroom oozes appeal with chic feature wall, contemporary bedside lighting and sophisticated window furnishing to creates a real sense of elegance and relaxation. Contemporary tiling populate the classy bathrooms, with the main comprising ensuite with double vanity and double shower. Shelving, cupboards and hanging space occupy all robes throughout the bedrooms whilst the laundry is fitted with countless storage options.
Further enhancements to this fine home include internally accessed auto garage, zoned refrigerated heating / cooling, video intercom, alarm, video surveillance system, butlers pantry and much more.
Within walking distance to Aston Fields Sports Complex, and only minutes to Craigieburn Central Shopping Complex, Highlands Lake, transport and other important amenities.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
A Flawless Integration of Space & Family Comfort on 521m2
Be seduced by this quality built Henley home which is sure to tick every single box on your must have wish list.
Flanked by beautifully landscaped gardens, walk up towards its impressive grand facade and enter a home that is sure to impress with its vast living spaces, bright interior and warm family character and charm.
The elite 30* square floor plan offers 4 king sized bedrooms, plus study, WIR & impressive ENS to a large master bedroom, spacious dual living zones with separate lounge, super-sized meals and family area perfect for large scale family gatherings, fully equipped kitchen with great storage and ample Ceasar stone bench space.
Step outside and be pleasantly surprised by the homes show piece entertainers alfresco deck which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor and outdoor integration. It also provides a safe low maintenance haven for kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy.
Located to perfection, directly opposite a stunning local park, Hume Anglican Grammar, Mt Ridley College, Highlands Shops, transport and jam packed with quality extras including ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, double remote garage, tradesperson's sized hard wired shed, alarm, CCTV, sparkling central bathroom, roomy laundry, stone benches throughout, huge allotment (521m2 approx) and much much more!
Homes like this do not come up often, so call now and be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
Luxurious & Convenient Living!
Situated in the Highlands Estate is the perfect balance of space, style and convenience sure to impress all. This radiant three bedroom home delivers smart low maintenance living with swift access to key lifestyle assets.
This remarkable residence features a functional floorplan inclusive of a spacious open plan kitchen, meals, living zone kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher overlooking the generously sized dining area which flows effortlessly into the sun soaked living area. Step outside and you will be greeted with an undercover concreted pergola perfect for entertaining all year round in addition to the low maintenance backyard.
Adding to this comfortable floorplan is three generously sized bedrooms with built in robes, master equipped with walk in robe and oversized ensuite, glowing central bathroom with shower & separate bath.
Enhancing this property's indisputable appeal is ducted heating and evaporative cooling, quality hardwood timber floors, high ceilings, see through & block out blinds and much, much more.
In a prime location close to all of Craigieburn's amenities, this property is surrounded by parks, within walking distance to Public Transport, Highlands-Stockland Shopping Centre, Mt Ridley College & Newbury Primary School. Be quick to inspect as this won't hang around for long.

Description:
A 33Sq Stunner, With All The Boxes Ticked!
Set on a wonderfully wide allotment with lush landscaped gardens all-round, this single-level sensation (by Carlisle Homes) delivers a lifestyle of luxury with its free-flowing design, multiple living/entertaining spaces & extensive list of upgraded features.
Designed to maximise light, space and functionality for the growing family, the home's indulgent 33sq* interior boasts an extra-large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private double ensuite boasting dual vanities and spa, together with 3 additional bedrooms (built-in robes), study/home office (optional 5th bedroom), stylish main bathroom and a conveniently placed guest powder room.
Adding to its family credentials is a large formal lounge, separate rumpus/living room & vast open-plan living/dining area complemented by a superb fully-equipped kitchen complete with stone benchtops, ample cupboard space & adjoining butler's pantry.
An emphasis on quality & efficiency, the home also includes dual zone ducted heating & refrigerative cooling, high ceilings, LED lighting, Bluetooth controlled watering system (backyard), as well as a large family laundry & excellent storage options.
Dual opening doors reveal a fabulous decked al-fresco entertaining area & private back garden surrounds, plus the added appeal of a remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Perched up high with its commanding street presence, in a thriving Aston neighbourhood, built with pride and located to absolute perfection, this needs home needs to be on your MUST SEE LIST!
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.
Insights: 30 Euphoria Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Designer Home With Captivating Spaces on 680m2
Design excellence, floorplan flexibility & a long list of features illustrate the allure of this massive single level home delivering a family environment situated in a blue-chip location within walking distance to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre & encompassing a commanding street presence with two crossovers, spacious interiors and situated on 680m2 (approx.) of land.
Walk up towards the impressive grand frontage & be graced by the homes immaculate light-filled interior which showcases 4 super large bedrooms plus 3 living areas, a master suite of epic proportions boasting walk-in robes, full ensuite and your very own Retreat area.
Continue through to the heart of the home & meet the hostess kitchen, fully equipped stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, stone benchtops, ample bench space, ample cupboard space & adjoining a large meals & family zone where everyday relaxing is accompanied by views of a colossal entertaining area where hosting large-scale parties will be a breeze. A side driveway provides plenty of space for cars, trailers and caravans.
Should you feel up for a quiet night in, the home even comes with an added bonus of a Theatre room/Rumpus.
Step outside and be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers alfresco deck which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration. It also provides a safe low maintenance haven for kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy. Extras include ducted heating, high ceilings, superb storage, striking main bathroom, roomy laundry & remote double garage with internal access.
Nothing to do but simply move in & start living, it also offers easy access to the area's popular schools & shopping centres, parks & trails, public transport & major arterials. Inspections will not disappoint. Call now & be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.
Insights: 71 Balyang Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Single-Level Style on a Large Craigieburn Corner
n a family-focused neighbourhood renowned for its large allotments and exceptional urban convenience, this fabulous home delivers on all fronts with its impressive indoor/outdoor space, abundance of natural light and close proximity to Craigieburn's key amenities.
Flawless presentation from start to finish, the home's sprawling single-level floorplan showcases an extra-large master bedroom with WIR and private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms with BIRs, home office (potential 4BR) and main family bathroom.
Versatile living zones add to the appeal including a formal lounge and dining with bay window, together with a spacious open-plan family/meals area accompanied by a contemporary timber-top kitchen with dual ovens, 900mm gas cooktop, dishwasher and ample cupboard space.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling for all-seasons enjoyment, security shutters, family-sized laundry and excellent storage options throughout.
Completing the picture is a spacious yet wonderfully private backyard complete with undercover entertaining deck, large wrap-around pergola, low-maintenance gardens and remote-control garage with internal entry.
Walking distance to Hothlyn Drive buses, local parks, primary and secondary schools, it's also close to childcare centres and kindergartens, choice of shopping centres, the convenience of Craigieburn Station and easy access to the Hume Freeway.
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
Single-Level Family Flair in the Heart of Highlands
With its free-flowing design, quality inclusions and established low-maintenance surrounds, this freestanding home delivers an environment that's ready to simply move in and enjoy - all in a family-focused neighbourhood with easy access to the best of Highlands.
Instantly inviting with its wide entrance hallway and abundance of natural light, the home features a large master bedroom with WIR and private ensuite with double vanity, as well as 3 additional bedrooms with robes and stylish main bathroom.
Spacious and versatile, the open-plan living/dining area is further enhanced by a stone-bench kitchen complete with island breakfast bar, tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances, dishwasher and large pantry.
Ducted heating and split-system air conditioning add to the appeal, along with solar/gas hot water, efficient LED lighting and CCTV monitoring system.
Step outside to discover a fabulous al-fresco entertaining deck and north-facing backyard with synthetic turf and high bamboo fencing all-round for exceptional privacy, plus a remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Newbury Boulevard buses at the end of the street, it's walking distance to local shops, childcare, community centre and Newbury Primary School, also close to Malcolm Creek trails and parkland, Highland Shopping Centre, Mount Ridley College and Hume Anglican Grammar.
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.
